alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:17PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Northern Inner Channel rivers and streams rising to near bankfull Saturday... Heavy rain from the Atmospheric River moving into the Northern Inner Channels will cause many area rivers and streams to rapidly rise to near bankfull late Friday night into Saturday. Flooding potential remains low, but any substantial changes in rainfall could result in higher or lower observed river levels. The most significant impacts are expected along the Chilkat River near Haines and Klukwan where the river may rise to near bankful on Saturday morning. Additionally, rising water along the Taiya River near Skagway may bring water onto the Chilkoot Trail early Saturday morning. Near Juneau, Jordan Creek has the best potential to reach bankfull stage, however recreators in and around other area rivers and streams should be prepared for rising water for the holiday weekend.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
